title: Randomly kicked out of a game?
body:
I was playing a ranked game when I randomly got disconnected, I restarted lol only to see I wasnt considered in game and could launch another one.
The game doesnt appear in my match history.
Am I crazy?

replies.body:
There was probably a hiccup going on with the Gameserver your match was being hosted on, which is why it didn't appear in your match history.

Let me know if you have any questions.
